description:
This plugin lets you zip and download multiple files including if they are not stored on aws S3 (where Bubble stores your apps' files).

It is a fork & update of the original plugin "Zip File Compress & Download" by segongora.
name: Zip and download files
plugin_instructions:
1) Provide zip filename (ex : myzipfile.zip) in the filename field - mandatory.
2) Provide a list of files urls (from a repeating group, or a database search, or options list...) in the "list of files" field.
